About Me

If you want to get to know me, read on...

BIO

I am a software developer with more than one year experience developing Desktop tools for several clients. I have proven experience as a front-end developer on three different projects. I understand the lifecycle of web development, and as a developer, I am included in all phases when working on a project. I can easily understand client's needs and deliver results based on them. My productivity is based on learning, motivation, and teamwork. I am not limited to certain frameworks or paradigm, I am flexible and open to new challenges. I am currently seeking long-term position which will allow me to further improve my software development skills.
